column4: Thanks ubuntu - I can not see any reason why the dummy people prefer to use windows -- as i find ubuntu is much easier for the PC beginners
I would like to report a good side effect after I have been with ubuntu for nearly 3 months
There is no good MySQL tools inside ubuntu -- and because of this -- I build one -- and would like to promote my freebie here :D
which tools did you not find?
there are many mysql tools.  You should check the universe and multiverse repositories
you'd really want to uninstall the package
if you install it, and want it removed, you uninstall it, rather than deleting sytsem files by hand
thanks - i also think so -- but actually you can simply delete wine --- sorry i m talking about xbox ? i forgot what virture machine i installed last time -- sorry
ubuntu uses packages.  While you _can_ delete files, you really should uninstall packages.
yes i just up one important feed back for ubuntu -- i can not upgrade thunderbird from 1.5 to 2.0
why the update check is grey in thunderbird and firefox ? dummy like me even do not know how to install a software after download it
1.5 is the latest version in the feisty repos
I told you - 1.5 is the latest version there is in the repos
you can play real media on ubuntu now
i read many posts says realone not working well in ubuntu -- so i m scared to install
thanks -- also i hope in 7.10 DVD can be played like window media player -- there is no title short cut in the ubuntu's ...? and i have to watch all 30 hours DVD at once -- square eyed
